property.name: text
property.value:
A simple demo for ScarabWayptSubscriber accesor. This accessor connects sets up a web socket and connects to rosbridge server, running on Scarab's ROS host. This accessor subscribes to the topic "/pose", published by Scarab, and extracts the current x, y coordinates from the JSON object it receives.
The accessor takes in the following 2 inputs: 1. address (string) of rosbridge, eg: "localhost" or "127.0.0.1" 2. port (number) of rosbridge, eg: 9090
It displays the coordinates it receives.

property.name: script
description
property.value: This accessor connects sets up a web socket and connects to rosbridge server, running on Scarab's ROS host. This accessor subscribes to the topic "/pose", published by Scarab,and extracts the current x, y coordinates from the JSON object it receives. When wrapup() is invoked, this accessor closes the connection.

property.name: error (port)
property.value: The error message if an error occurs. If this port is not connected and an error occurs, then an exception is thrown instead.

property.name: server (port-parameter)
property.value: The IP address or domain name of the server.

property.name: port (port-parameter)
property.value: The port that the web socket server listens to.
